summary: After her son gets killed in a car crash, Elena loses all lust for life. Recovering from the crash in a hospital a stranger, David, kidnaps her and takes her for a mysterious journey in an old camper.
cast: Titus De Voogdt|Steffi Peeters|Marijke Pinoy|Simon Van Braeckel|Dirk van Dijck|Pieter Van Hees|Louiza Vande Woestyne
title: Small Gods
